Subject: Pulling Out Slowly
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/
Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Firestarter/Unitron/Chordate/Imprisoner/Predator/
Choran:



Dark One saw the three Brotherhood members and the Predacon prisoners and 
Alliance forces exit the Cybertronian Fire almost simultaneously.  He didn't 
want to do what he had to do.  He activated the eject sequence, his cockpit 
shooting open and the pilot's seat following it, Chordate flying from his 
seat, not being strapped in, and hit the ground several feet from the seat.

The Oblitercon leader kept his weapons powered, awaiting FZ's orders to leave 
the Cybertronian Fire and head back home.

---

Breakdown kept his weapon trained, stretching his legs, getting for the long 
journey home.

---

Pyro transformed to his rather mutilated looking tank mode (thanks to 
missiles) and powered up its engine, getting ready to go top speed in his 
broken and battered condition.

---

Hiss climbed up on top of Pyro, opening the hatch and jumping inside, 
shutting and locking the hatch after he got in.

---

Scavenger stayed in his HUMVEE mode, revving up the engine.

===

Hot Spot ignored the Alliance members and other Maximals, focusing in on his 
wounded.  He picked up Blades carefully, walking towards the CF.  "Get First 
Aid, VERY carefully." he ordered.

---

Groove grabbed First Aid by the feet while Streetwise got his arms and they 
slowly made their way towards the destroyed main entrance of the Cybertronian 
Fire.

---

Demon Wulf transformed into his mutant wolf mode, clawing at the ground with 
a snarl.

---

Flesh Ripper stayed in his beast mode, the hyena making a laughing noise at 
Chordate being slammed to the ground.

---

Dark Claw remained silent in his attack vehicle mode, no noise coming from 
him save his powerful engines.

---

Sixshot leapt into the air, hovering several feet from the ground, keeping 
his blasters at the ready.  He'd rain hell down upon the Maximals if 
something happened.

---

Ares kept his rifle at the ready, slowly walking closer to FZ.

---

Unitron stepped outside of the Cybertronian Fire looking around.  An 
important phase was complete.  He turned to Firestarter swiftly.  "Locate 
Shockwave and go to him and help him with whatever is needed.  I will handle 
things with the Alliance."

"Understood." the pyromaniac said, transforming into his space fighter mode 
and launching off into the air towards the general direction of the antarctic.

Imprisoner looked to Predator and Choran, motioning for them to stay still.

"What of us?"

"You will serve me.  I freed you, and I can kill you just as easily." Unitron 
said, walking towards FZ, the three ex-bounty hunters in tow, not really 
caring.  Their ship could be signaled to come and retrieve them if needed.
